  • Method Details

    • register

      public boolean register(Transition transition)
      Adds a new Transition to the StateMachine Keeps a list of all unique States added to the StateMachine
      Parameters:
      transition - Transition to add
      Returns:
      true if State is new, false is State is already present

    • updateAllTransitions

      public void updateAllTransitions()
      Updates the StateMachine by forcing a Forceable Transition (Uses List order)

    • attemptTransition

      public StateMachine.MachineResponse attemptTransition(State destination)
      Transitions the machine to the desired State if able
      Parameters:
      destination - State to attempt to move to
      Returns:
      MachineResponse.NOPATH if no registered Transitions, MachineResponse.BLOCKED if all registered Transitions are blocked, MachineResponse.SUCCESSFUL if succeeded

    • setCurrentState

      public void setCurrentState(State current)
      Used to set the State that the machine is currently in
      Parameters:
      current - Current State
